sendResult(T).Description: Send the result back to the caller.

detach().Description: Detach this message from the current thread and allow the @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService#Result#sendResult_E@ call to happen later.

ClassDesc: Completion handler for asynchronous callback methods in @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService_E@. Each of the methods that takes one of these to send the result must call @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService#Result#sendResult_E@ to respond to the caller with the given results. If those functions return without calling @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService#Result#sendResult_E@, they must instead call @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService#Result#detach_E@ before returning, and then may call @B_android#service#media#MediaBrowserService#Result#sendResult_E@ when they are done. If more than one of those methods is called, an exception will be thrown.
